name: Beacon Tower
description: A tall structure with a powerful light serves as a navigation aid and communication system for travelers and ships. The navigation aid provides guidance and safety for travelers, while the strategic importance and potential structural failure create constant danger.
atmosphere: A brilliant flame burns atop the tall stone tower, visible for miles across the landscape. Signal mirrors and flags allow communication with distant outposts. The air carries burning oil and sea salt. Narrow windows provide panoramic views of the surrounding territory.
